text:
Regarding to Apache help files, mod_perl2 also works with Apache 2.2 but it doese not!
There is no way to install mod_perl2 with Apache 2.2
creator: sambukkaa@hotmail.com
sander@temme.net
text:
Tim, 

Which Help Files are you talking about?  Is this Apache documentation or mod_perl documentation?  Note that mod_perl has its own process for reporting issues, described on 

http://perl.apache.org/docs/2.0/user/help/help.html#Reporting_Problems

If it is the Apache documentation, please let us know which page contains the incorrect information.  

If you tried to install and got stuck, please discuss the steps you took on the appropriate mailinglist before filing an issue.
